name: amurex
tagline: A backend platform providing neural memory and intelligent recall for AI-driven applications
description: Amurex is the backend system behind memory-based AI assistants. It provides neural memory and intelligent recall features using a flexible API and vector database, aimed at building personalized knowledge-driven AI apps.

features.title: Neural Memory
features.description: AI assistants with long-term memory capabilities. Context that persists

features.title: Intelligent Recall
features.description: Retrieve relevant information from past conversations automatically. Never repeat yourself

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Efficient storage and retrieval using modern vector search. Lightning-fast queries

features.title: REST API
features.description: Easy integration with your AI applications and workflows. Build personalized AI

features.title: Knowledge
features.description: Create AI that learns and remembers user preferences. Truly personal assistants

features.title: Self-Hosted

features.title: Scalable
